Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Geobacillin 6 (Geo6, natural AMPs; XXI, bacteriocin; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryote; UCLL1, BBMm)

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: gene cluster identification in the genome via BAGEL4. purified via Ni2+ affinity chromatography column.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (51.92%) toleaderless bacteriocin Lacticin ZI: 15%: A=D=K: 13%. GRAVY: 0.15; M Wt: 5472.496; Mol formula: C250H411N64O67S2; molar extinction coeff: 16650.Activity: active mostly against thermophilic bacteria. Active against G. lituanicus DSM 15325T (MIC 0.585 uM), G. kaustophilus HTA 426 (MIC 0.293 uM), G. thermodenitrificans DSM 465T (MIC 2.34 uM), G. thermoleovorans DSM 5366T (MIC 0.585 uM), and P. toebii DSM 14590T (MIC 4.45 uM). In addition, spot on a lawn assay at 55oC: growth inhibition: A. pallidus DSM 3670T (+++), A. tepidamans DSM 16325T (+), G. stearothermophilus DSM 22T or DSM 15325T (+), G. gargensis DSM 15378T (+), G. debilis DSM 16016T (++), G. jurassicus DSM 15726T (+), and B. zanthoxyli CH07 (+). Inactive: A.tepidamans DSM 16315 (-), G.caldoxylosilyticus DSMZ 12833, G.subterraneus DSM 13552T, G.thermocatenulatus, G.uzenensis DSM 13551T, P.genomospecies 1 NUB 36187, P.thermoglucosidasius DSM 2542T, B.spizizenii ATCC 6633, B.subtilis 168, B.velezensis CH02, P.aeruginosa ATCC 27853, S. epidermidis ATCC 12228, S.aureus subsp. aureus ATCC 25923, S.saprophyticus AG1, E.faecalis DSMZ 2570,  S.enterica serovar Typhimurium, fungi S.cerevisiae, C.lusitaniae, C.guilliermondii, C.albicans ATCC 14053, A.baumannii, S.maltophilia, E.coli.Structure: helical (10 uM) in 10 mM PBS. 3D predicted  using I-TASSER web tool.Stability: stable to heat (active after heating at 100oC for 2 h) and pH (stable 3-7).Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: the peptide gene was inserted into a pET15b vector and cloned into bacteria for expression via IPTG induction. The resombinant peptide contains one additional glycine at the N-terminus after cleavage with TEV. Provided by Arnoldas Kaunietis.
Literature Information.Author: Koniuchovaite A, Petkeviciute A, Bernotaite E, Gricajeva A, Gegeckas A, Kalediene L, Kaunietis A. 2023
Literature Information.Title: Novel leaderless bacteriocin geobacillin 6 from thermophilic bacterium Parageobacillus thermoglucosidasius.
